headline: MarketAxess launches electronic trading platform for foreign investors in Indian bonds
summary: U.S.-based MarketAxessHoldings said on Tuesday it has launched electronic tradingservices for Indian government bonds, making it the firstplatform to give foreign investors direct access to the...

headline: MarketAxess Becomes First Platform to Provide Fully Electronic Workflow for the Trading of Indian Government Bonds to International Investors
summary: NEW YORK, June 16, 2025--MarketAxess Holdings Inc. (Nasdaq: MKTX), the operator of a leading electronic trading platform for fixed-income securities, today announced the launch of the first fully electronic trading solution for Indian Government Bonds (IGBs) for Foreign Portfolio Investors (FPIs).
